sentences.sContent: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.sCn: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.sContent: the delicious smell of new-mown grass
...Women want to be able to do it all volunteer for school parties or cook delicious meals，and so their answer to any request is often Yes...
...There are a variety of delicious foods for you to choose...

words.tran: 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的

trans.tranOther: very pleasant to taste or smell
